Name: Roman The Worm
About the game: Roman The Worm Roman The Worm is a fun and tricky 2D Jump 'n' Run game. You are lost under the ground, surrounded by all kinds of creatures, bosses and challenges. Strong weapons and handy items will help you through your adventure of finding your family. Roman The Worm Enemys Roman The Worm Maps Roman's Story It was a normal day when suddenly an earthquake separates Roman the worm from his family. He finds himself lost under the ground in a huge tunnel system filled with various other creatures. Time is tight and he has to defy the danger on his way through all kinds of enemies while searching for his lost family members.
